ygData.subject: RE: ebay
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I d have to say that ebay must be more fun that watching etrade. Ugh! More pain than losing a level. :-| Windleaf
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'd have to say that ebay must be more fun that watching etrade. Ugh!
More pain than losing a level. :-|

Windleaf


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 4:15 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] ebay
>
>
> i am so bored at work i am surfing the ebay auctions. i think the
> salesmanship is hilarious, how almost all items are touted as
> the best and
> their effects completely exaggerated. two that just made me
> laugh was that
> mistmoore battle drums increase songs by 30% (more like 16%
> by Maravana's
> numbers, and widely believed to be no more than 20%) and the
> haste sash
> increasing attack speed by 30% (more like 15%, the best
> warrior sword in the
> game off Innoruuk is 30%). anyway, just a comment.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
